Meet Team Owens for mobile office hours tomorrow in Juab Co. if you're having issues with the IRS, VA benefits, passports, or any federal agency. We're here to help you!

For more information, visit https://t.co/REkdD4XUTC. https://t.co/uhy2UgjeUi

Meet Team Owens for mobile office hours tomorrow in Sanpete Co. if you're having issues with the IRS, VA benefits, passports, or any federal agency. 

We're here to help you! For more information, visit https://t.co/REkdD4XUTC. https://t.co/GuGlHFE8mB

Roughly 93% of ARP funding for K-12 schools remains unspent.

Today, I introduced the Securing Our Students Act, legislation allowing local schools to use these funds to implement evidence-based safety measures that protect our students in the classroom. https://t.co/KAxRoEe5kX

On the 78th anniversary of #DDay, we remember and honor the 160,000 Allied troops who stormed the beaches of Normandy to defend freedom.

May we never forget the courage and sacrifice of the Greatest Generation. https://t.co/noFnrlEich
